title: Activate a release model
content:
Note You must have the appropriate permissions to be able to activate a release model.

To activate a release model means changing its status, as shown in the workflow snapshot at the top of the model, from draft to active.

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Release > Models.

  2. Select the release model.

    Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. Click Active, then Save.

Related topics

  • How to create a release model
  • How to edit a release model
  • How to retire a release model
